Shivadhesh.Description: Shivadhesh is a user-friendly E-commerce website that develop an intuitive and visually appealing user interface that ensures easy navigation and enhances the overall user experience. It is a responsive website that is compatible with all devices.

Mechanism of Action Prediction.Description: Mechanism of Action Prediction is a machine learning project that predicts the mechanism of action of a drug. It is a multi-label classification problem.
